system.description:
Also at 2nd level you can use the wind to uncover secret information. By spending 10 minutes concentrating outside, you may cast the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.84xbuk6c7yo86ga7]{Locate Object} spell without expending a spell slot.

At 6th level you may instead cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.kk7n5fm5uz9xwrr2]{Locate Creature} in this way.

At 10th level you can cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.ppht0do531mq84uw]{Scrying} in this way. Once you do so you cannot do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

None of these spells function if the target is underwater, in a vacuum, in an airtight container, or otherwise does not have a path between you and it or them through the air, however small.
